ViewObject.Name: PublishedIAMQVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT pc.dict_content_code tms_code, pc.term tms_name, pc.created_by tms_created_by, l.short_name level_name, g.name activation_group FROM nmat_state_designee_vw s, nmat_properties p, tms.tms_def_levels l, tms.tms_predict_groups g, tms.tms_predict_contents pc, tms.tms_dict_contents c WHERE s.state = 'PUBLISHED IA' AND p.domain = 'TMS.RELEASE_GROUPS' AND p.prop_name = 'DEFAULT_MEDDRA_RELEASE' AND UPPER(g.name) = UPPER(p.prop_value) AND s.dict_content_id = c.dict_content_id AND l.def_level_id = c.def_level_id AND c.dict_content_id = pc.predict_content_id AND pc.predict_group_id = g.predict_group_id AND TO_CHAR(c.end_ts,'DD-MON-YYYY') = '15-AUG-3501' UNION SELECT c.dict_content_code tms_code, c.term tms_name, c.created_by tms_created_by, l.short_name level_name, NULL activation_group FROM nmat_state_designee_vw s, tms.tms_def_levels l, tms.tms_dict_contents c WHERE s.state = 'PUBLISHED IA' AND s.dict_content_id = c.dict_content_id AND l.def_level_id = c.def_level_id AND TO_CHAR(c.end_ts,'DD-MON-YYYY') = '15-AUG-3501' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tms.tms_predict_contents WHERE predict_content_id = s.dict_content_id) UNION SELECT pc.dict_content_code tms_code, pc.term tms_name, pc.created_by tms_created_by, l.short_name level_name, g.name activation_group FROM nmat_state_designee_vw s, nmat_properties p, tms.tms_def_levels l, tms.tms_predict_groups g, tms.tms_predict_contents pc WHERE s.state = 'PUBLISHED IA' AND p.domain = 'TMS.RELEASE_GROUPS' AND p.prop_name = 'DEFAULT_MEDDRA_RELEASE' AND UPPER(g.name) = UPPER(p.prop_value) AND s.dict_content_id = pc.predict_content_id AND l.def_level_id = pc.def_level_id AND g.predict_group_id = pc.predict_group_id AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tms.tms_dict_contents WHERE dict_content_id = s.dict_content_id AND TO_CHAR(end_ts,'DD-MON-YYYY') = '15-AUG-3501')
